findPathProcessCell

public void findPathProcessCell(int processX,
                                int processY,
                                GridCell currentCell)
processes a cell as a part of the A* algorithm as long as the cell: - actually exists on the grid, - isn't marked as an obstacle and - isn't already in the closed set

Parameters:
processX - the X of the cell to be processed
processY - the Y of the cell to be processed
currentCell - a reference to the "current cell" of which this one is adjacent to

aStarHeuristic

public float aStarHeuristic(GridCell processCell)
The heuristics function for A*.

Parameters:
processCell - the cell we're processing
Returns:
the distance to the goal as determined by the heuristic function
